name: The Labyrinth (itch) (Evilous)
description:
Use arrow keys to move around. Press s to start

Good luck!

Can you beat this Labyrinth in under 60 seconds flat?

This is a short 1 level labyrinth I made in my free time. At first it was very easy so I edited it so It has a twisting shader, the camera rotates constantly, a fog of war and you have to hit 1 or 2 switches to be able to get the the goal.

Took a bit over an hour to make the game itself.
